revised_title: Papers on Enamel Development in Osseous Fish and Thermo-dynamical Properties of Superheated Steam
tldr: This article presents two papers read to the Royal Society of London. The first paper discusses the development of enamel in certain osseous fish by Charles S. Tomes, while the second paper, by J. H. Grindley, investigates the thermo-dynamical properties of superheated steam. Both papers contribute to the understanding of their respective fields.
